children.caption: The video opens with a man describing the aftermath of a recent volcanic eruption to a large crowd gathered around a bus, while another man's voice describes the eruption of a volcano in New Zealand to a group of people gathered around a boulder. The video then cuts to a news report covering the impact of the volcanic eruption in New Zealand on the tourism industry, showing footage of tourists and emergency responders dealing with the aftermath of the eruption. The report also includes interviews with experts and witness
children.summary: A volcanic eruption in New Zealand has caused widespread disruption, with ash and smoke affecting flights and prompting evacuations, and the tourism industry severely impacted, with a large cruise ship docked at a harbor. The eruption has also caused concern among locals and tourists alike, with reports of victims being tended to on a beach and a massive plume of ash and smoke rising from the mountain.

tree.caption: A massive volcanic eruption in New Zealand, with footage of the eruption and its aftermath, including a news report on the impact of the eruption on the tourism industry.
tree.summary: A massive volcanic eruption in the ocean was captured on video, with a plume of ash and steam rising high into the sky, and a nearby town affected by the event. The eruption has caused widespread disruption in New Zealand, with ash and smoke affecting flights, prompting evacuations, and severely impacting the tourism industry.
